p: That the said imprisionment detention confinement and restraint are illegal and that the illegally thereof consists in this to writ: That the said plaintiffs herein were manners on board of the american ship War-Hawk on the ninth day of December A.D. 1876. That on the siad ninth day of December 1876 while said plaintiffs were on board the said ships in the performance of their duty as mariners thereon. They the said plaintiffs and all of them, were taken into the custody and under the control of the said L. V. Wyckoff Deputy Untied States Marshal as aforesaid detained confined and restrained of their liberty at the city jail in the city of Seattle aforesaid since which time the said plaintiffs have been so unlawfully restrained of their liberty by the said Deputy Marshal. That the said Deputy Marshal arrested the said plaintiffs and each and all of them, and so unlawfully detainecd them of their liberty.
